title: [HOLD for payment 2023-06-07] [$1000] Login - No message that the account was "Closed Successfully" below the email field
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to URL https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Login to ND
3. Navigate to Settings > Security
4. Click/tap on "Close Account"

Expected result: User are logged out and that there's a message in the login screen that the account was "Closed Successfully" below the email field.

Actual result: None
